document.heading: Tax Revision Commission Establishment Act of 1996

history.narrative: Law 11-143, the “Tax Revision Commission Establishment Act of 1996,” was introduced in Council and assigned Bill No. 11-383, which was referred to the Committee of the Whole. The Bill was adopted on first and second readings on March 5, 1996, and April 2, 1996, respectively. Signed by the Mayor on April 18, 1996, it was assigned Act No. 11-383 and transmitted to both Houses of Congress for its review. D.C. Law 11-143 became effective on June 13, 1996.
